title: ici
author: ici
content: We are launching a new DeFi protocol on ethereum and would like to grow our community, thuscreating this giveaway for 3 simple tasksAbout the project Audit on the way from dessert financepeer to peer dexchange without the AMM factor, thus empowering users to trade at whatever price they wishsay bye to frontrunners, slippage, bots and get more for your swapsAssuming you find the party to counter trade, you can swap stablecoins at same rate (e.g swap 1 billion USDT for 1 billion DAI)No token released or planned. Giveaway InfoYou can carry your tasks there https://forms.gle/R6js82Vym6ufgtFY8Feel free saying hi on telegramQuoteNotice. If you try interacting with the protocol, would recommend waiting for post audit changes when contract will be open source

comments.author: Dean2
comments.body: QuoteGiveaways, games, raffles, airdrops and other promotional campaigns that pay out a part or all of their rewards in altcoins do not belong in Games and Rounds. Giveaways and other similar promotional campaigns that pay out in altcoins and do not require users to post in your thread / topic to participate can be be posted in Bounties (Altcoins). Make sure to read the stickied threads in the aforementioned board before you post there.You should probably move this topic here: Bounties
